entry.tran: 夸夸其谈的；大话连篇的；词藻华丽空洞的
entry.def: If you describe someone as bombastic, you are criticizing them for trying to impress other people by saying things that sound impressive but have little meaning.

example.ex: ...the bombastic style adopted by his predecessor.
example.tran: 他的前任夸夸其谈的作风
